Posts.Content: Apr 8, 2009 03:58PM brenda63 wrote: Hi, my name is Brenda and I started RADs on March 24... I have to do 37 rads and here I am having pain already. My lung hurts a little and today when I woke up my rib started to hurt. Has anyone felt pain this early in the rads treatment? I get a sore throat too.
Posts.Title: Soreness and Pain after Radiation Minnegirl1 Shirlann
